        Starts routing a connection. p_pen_half_width_arr is provided because it may be different from the half width array in p_board.rules.

        p_layer - a int.

      • next_corner

        public boolean next_corner(FloatPoint p_corner)
        Append a line to the trace routed so far. Return true, if the route is completed by connecting to a target.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a boolean.
